typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as integer,
		ReturnDate as integer,
		RentalCost as decimal(19,4),
		LateFee as decimal(19,4),
		RewindFlag as boolean,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> VanArsdelRental
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffee
VanArsdelRental derive(RentalDate = toDate(RentalDate),
		ReturnDate = toDate(RentalDate),
		SourceID = 2,
		UniqueTransactionID = concat(toString(2), toString(uuid())),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat(toString(2), CustomerID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat(toString(2), MovieID),
		LateFee = toFloat(LateFee)) ~> AddSystemIDVanArsdel
FourthCoffee derive(CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate),
		RentalCost = toFloat(RentalCost),
		LateFee = toFloat(LateFee),
		SourceId = 3,
		UniqueTransactionID = concat(toString(3), toString(uuid())),
		ModifiedRentaldate = toDate(substring(RentalDate, 1,4)+"-"+substring(RentalDate, 5,2)+"-"+substring(RentalDate, 7,2)),
		ModifiedReturnDate = toDate(substring(ReturnDate, 1,4)+"-"+substring(ReturnDate, 5,2)+"-"+substring(ReturnDate, 7,2)),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat(toString(3), CustomerID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat(toString(3),MovieID),
		RewindFlag = toBinary(RewindFlag)) ~> AddSystemIDFourthCoffee
AddSystemIDVanArsdel select(mapColumn(
		SourceID,
		UniqueTransactionID,
		TransactionID,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		CustomerID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		ReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectVanArsdel
AddSystemIDFourthCoffee select(mapColumn(
		SourceID = SourceId,
		UniqueTransactionID,
		TransactionID,
		UniqueCustomerID,
		CustomerID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate = ModifiedRentaldate,
		ReturnDate = ModifiedReturnDate,
		RentalCost,
		Latefee = LateFee,
		RewindFlag,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4Coffeefields
